metadata.name: Why us?
metadata.description:
The painful cries are a result of the actions of some people who are "careless" and "indifferent".

This artwork was created to raise awareness about the air pollution problem in Chiang Mai, Thailand. 
It is part of the "Land of Smoke" mini art exhibition, which showcases the work of 20 talented artists from Chiang Mai who are dedicated to bringing attention to the issue.

Files type : MP4
Song : Soften (Prod. by TDKILL.)
Dimensions : 1684 x 2382
